game:charattribute-hungerrate-0.1: +10% hunger rate, for every 100 saturation above 500, gain 2% melee damage, 3% hunger rate, and 4.5% mining speed but for every 100 saturation below 500, lose 4% melee damage, 6% hunger rate, and 9% mining speed
game:traitdesc-merciless: For every 1% movement speed lost, gain 2% melee damage. Also includes craftable shortsword and shield
game:traitdesc-timed: Unable to regenerate temporal stability by being in stable zones
game:traitdesc-tinkerer: Exclusive craftable devices and watches
game:traitdesc-clothier: Exclusive craftable sewing kit, clothes and temporal bandage. When crafting wearable items, have a chance to add an extra stat. Extra stats can be rerolled by crafting the item with sewing kits, doing this also fully restores durability.
game:itemdesc-spear-generic-hacking: Attack a locust for a chance to convert it into an ally. It will follow and protect you, and you can have as many as you like. Bring the wayward children home.
game:traitdesc-improviser: Exclusive craftable sling and climbing tool
game:traitdesc-rogue: Able to perform a dodge by pressing [F] with a 2 second cooldown. The keybind can be rebound
game:traitdesc-trapper: Exclusive craftable traps (the bad kind)
game:charattribute-armorDurabilityLoss--: +10% armor durability, new recipes to give 2 extra healing items from crafting
game:traitdesc-bowyer: Exclusive craftable bows and arrows, most arrow crafting can be trippled
